plymedia.description: PLYmedia captions provides on demand and realtime caption services. This player demonstrate plyMedia captions on top of video playback. Learn more about adding PLYmedia services to your account

subpos.doc: 1 - 100. 1 being highest (captions at the top of the video), 100 being lowest (captions at the default bottom which is 40 px).

deflang.doc: Default language - language code or \none' for no default language.

showbackground.doc: Determine whether captions have background or not.
